com.deezer.sdk.player

Class PodcastPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deezer.sdk.player.AbstractPlayerWrapper
      • com.deezer.sdk.player.PodcastPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerWrapper

    public class PodcastPlayer
extends com.deezer.sdk.player.AbstractPlayerWrapper
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Podcast.

    An PodcastPlayer can be launched very easily using the following code : 

     
      PodcastPlayer podcastPlayer = new PodcastPlayer(application, deezerConnect,
                            new WifiOnlyNetworkStateChecker());
      podcastPlayer.addPlayerListener(listener);
      podcastPlayer.playPodcast(podcastId);

    • Constructor Detail

      • PodcastPlayer

        public PodcastPlayer(Application application,
                     DeezerConnect deezerConnect,
                     NetworkStateChecker networkStateChecker)
              throws TooManyPlayersExceptions,
                     DeezerError
        Creates an autonomous AbstractTrackListPlayer. No parameter can be null
        Parameters:
        application - the current application
        deezerConnect - a deezerConnect object initialised to be used with Deezer Album
        networkStateChecker - a component able to monitor network availability.
        Throws:
        TooManyPlayersExceptions - thrown when Player cannot be created because too many other players are still alived
        DeezerError - if deezerConnect is not properly initialized otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • getEpisodes

        public final List<Episode> getEpisodes()
        Returns:
        the list of episodes played by this player

      • getCurrentEpisode

        public final Episode getCurrentEpisode()
        Returns:
        the episode currently being played or null if the player has no episode

      • getCurrentEpisodeIndex

        public int getCurrentEpisodeIndex()
        Returns:
        the index of the current episode being played

      • setRepeatMode

        public final void setRepeatMode(PlayerWrapper.RepeatMode repeatMode)
        Sets the repeat mode of the current player. Some PlayerWrapper implementations may ignore the repeat mode
        Parameters:
        repeatMode - the repeat mode

      • getRepeatMode

        public final PlayerWrapper.RepeatMode getRepeatMode()
        Returns:
        the current player repeat mode

      • skipToPreviousTrack

        public final boolean skipToPreviousTrack()
        Asks the player to skip to the previous track
        Returns:
        if the player skipped to the next track. If the current track is the first of the list, or if skipping is not allowed, then false is returned

      • skipToNextTrack

        public final boolean skipToNextTrack()
        Asks the player to skip to the next track
        Returns:
        if the player skipped to the next track. If the current track is the last of the list, or if skipping is not allowed, then false is returned

      • skipToTrack

        public final boolean skipToTrack(int trackIndex)
        Skip to the nth track of the list
        Parameters:
        trackIndex - the index of the track in the list
        Returns:
        if the player skipped to the next track. If the track index is out of bounds, or skip is not allowed, then false is return

      • playPodcast

        public void playPodcast(long podcastId)
        Starts playing a podcast
        Parameters:
        podcastId - the id of the podcast to play

      • playPodcast

        public void playPodcast(long podcastId,
                        int trackIndex)
        Starts playing a podcast at a given track
        Parameters:
        podcastId - the id of the podcast play
        trackIndex - the index of the track to play first
